title: Educational Program to Foster Situational Interest in High School Students Through Collaborative Citizen Science

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic scientific terminology and simple experimental procedures
context.additional_context: A program stimulating scientific curiosity by engaging high school students in local ecosystem monitoring. Combines smartphone-based data collection with simple classroom experiments

learning_goals: Learners can explain citizen science concepts and their societal contribution mechanisms
Using simulation-based digital tools, learners perform experimental procedures for eDNA sample collection and analysis
Through team-based activities, learners recognize and discuss collaborative characteristics of scientific discovery

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
